I've seen live webcast of ITC sessions where GB =
output is fed directly into the mic line in on a computer running Adobe Aud=
ition with the spectragraph running. It was really compelling to see letter=
s and numbers, not images or pictures, but partial words appear in the grap=
h. At first it was I thought it was a software glitch but it is a repeatabl=
e event. It was on LiveSciFi which is run by Tim Wood, he also thought ther=
e was some kind of code error but it happened on more than one webcast. 

S=
o if anyone has Audition, just feed Box output right in your computer and s=
ee what happens. I wanted to try it tonight but I have Audacity and the spe=
ctragraph feature doesn't have that shaded appearance that Audition does so=
 it's not able to render images or characters, at least as far as I see usi=
ng the various settings.
